heroSection.headline: Building Secure, Scalable, and AI-Powered Solutions.
heroSection.tagline: A B.Tech Information Technology student specializing in cloud security and modern full-stack development.

about.description: Hello! I'm Sarjeeth, a developer with a deep interest in the intersection of cloud infrastructure and application security. I thrive on solving complex problems and am committed to a process of continuous learning and improvement. When I'm not coding, I enjoy exploring the latest advancements in artificial intelligence.

services.description: Implementing secure and scalable cloud solutions.
